title: The Matrix Awakening: A Test Journey
description: A short test video featuring iconic quotes from The Matrix, structured into an intro, content, and conclusion scene to demonstrate video production pipeline functionality.

scenes.title: Waking from the Dream
scenes.description: Introduces the theme of reality versus illusion with a welcoming quote, setting the stage for the Matrix narrative.
narrative_beats: Emphasizing the transition from simulation to truth.
visual_ideas: Display falling green code in the background, fading in a red pill and blue pill on screen.
Show a simple timeline graphic revealing 'Matrix' as the illusion and 'Reality' as the awakening.

scenes.title: The Fabric of Deception
scenes.description: Explains the pervasive nature of the Matrix using a key quote, building understanding of its omnipresence.
narrative_beats: It surrounds us in daily life.
Pulled over our eyes to hide the truth.
visual_ideas: Progressive bullet points listing examples: window view, television, work, taxes.
Evolving right-side diagram showing a human figure trapped in a grid, transforming into a cityscape, then dissolving into code.

scenes.title: The Path to Discovery
scenes.description: Concludes with a call to personal experience, reinforcing that truth must be seen firsthand.
narrative_beats: Unfortunately, no one can be told what the Matrix is.
You have to see it for yourself.
visual_ideas: Fade in a door graphic with a hand reaching for the knob.
End with a callout text: 'Choose your path' alongside a split-screen of the blue pill (stay) and red pill (awaken).
